overview: Three lovely horny housewives come up with a business plan to make extra money and prove to their husbands that they can contribute more than just good looks and great blowjobs. Though their husbands believe the scheme is doomed to failure the wives prove to be quite the entrepreneurs as their little flower shop begins to blossom in Petals, the porno! Six steamy sex scenes ties this film together, including a hot anal scene in the flower shop as well as a wet and wild outdoor pool scene that takes the words, getting wet, to a whole new level will leave your balls drier than ever before!
tagline: The Love affair continues... In a Flower Shop
title: Petals
